original_title: Luxure: Les obsessions de ma femme
overview: Ginebra and Ricky are madly in love with each other and although they have been a couple for a long time, passion and desire are always present. Because of her husband's regular business trips, Ginebra doesn't spend as much time with him as she would like. However, the couple has made it a habit to make the most of their long moments of separation while pleasing each other.
title: Luxure: My Wife's Obsessions
